duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategic mapping of a high-level Project Plan and conducting a project scope and timeline review.
Managing engineering resources and equipment, including being the single point-of-contact for Customer and coordinating all Project-related activities through completion of tasks and Deliverables.

Hosting a kickoff meeting to communicate the schedule, responsibilities, and expectations and developing the deployment schedule and delivering the final Project Plan for formal review and acceptance with the Customer.
Conducting administrative functions such as completion of weekly status reports, attendance at project meetings, and project issue escalations.
Identifying and documenting dependencies, risks, and issues associated with the successful completion of the project and delivering weekly project status reports to the Customer.
Coordinating and managing all Subcontractor responsibilities under the SOW and delivering end-of-project report(s) and presenting key findings and recommendations.
Acting as the focal point for change control management and escalating any project-related issues requiring assistance to the Customer’s Project Manager.
Jointly developing milestones and delivery dates with the Customer and providing a handover, follow-on actions, lessons learned, and exception reports upon project completion.
Coordinating efforts with installation partners and being responsible for the management of the Project Plan and Deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
